title: A godlie and zealous prayer to bee vsed of euery Christian and duetifull [sic] subiecte for the preseruation of our most soueraigne Lady Elizabeth, by the grace of God, of England, Fraunce, and Irelande Queene, and in all causes as well ecclesiasticall as temporall, next vnder God of the Church of Englande and Irelande supreame gouernesse I.P.
author: I. P.
publicationStmtPublisher: By Hugh Singleton, dwelling in Smithfielde at the signe of the Golden Tunne, printer to the right honorable citie of London,
